jtorrent.tracker

Class JTracker.PeerRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtorrent.common.JPeer
      • jtorrent.tracker.JTracker.PeerRef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    JTracker

    public class JTracker.PeerRef
extends JPeer
    A class used by the server to reference a peer that is using this server.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PeerRef

        public PeerRef(JTorrent torrent,
               java.lang.String ip,
               int port,
               byte[] id)
        Creates a new peer reference for this tracker to follow.
        Parameters:
        torrent - Torrent that the peer is using.
        ip - IP address of the peer.
        port - Port of the peer.
        id - Unique peer id

    • Method Detail

      • isExpired

        public boolean isExpired()
        Checks if this peer has expired or not.
        Returns:
        true if the peer is expired.

      • update

        public void update(JPeer.State newState,
                   long bytesUploaded,
                   long bytesDowloaded,
                   long bytesLeft)
        Updates the state of this peer reference when the tracker receives an announce for this peer.
        Parameters:
        newState - New state of the peer.
        bytesUploaded - New number of bytes uploaded by this peer.
        bytesDowloaded - New number of bytes downloaded.
        bytesLeft - New number of bytes left.
